channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Easter 2024
item.description: The University will be closed from 29 March to 1 April for the Easter holidays.%0A

item.description: The University will be closed from 29 March to 1 April for the Easter holidays.%0A

item.title: Call for the A2 - B1 CELI i exams on 8 May 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the Italian language for foreigners CELi i exams (Italian Language Certificate for Immigrants) - level A2 and B1 - taking place on 8 May 2024.%0AN.B.: the seats for the B1 CELI i exam are sold out.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti. a.y. 2023/2024
item.description: For the academic year 2023/2024, the University is giving out three study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti.%0AFor further information, check out the calls for applications on the dedicated pages.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
